value.title: Get your Power BI Report Server Product Key (Minute Monday)
value.excerpt: In this Minute Monday, Adam shows you how to get your Power BI Report Server product key. This will allow you to install a valid copy of Power BI Report Server.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Mark as Date Table in Power BI Desktop is here!

This feature was introduced in the February 2018 release of Power BI Desktop. Mark as Date Table has been available

value.title: Microsoft R, Data Science and Power BI

We use Microsoft R Open and then move onto Power BI Desktop.  The example used in Microsoft R Open is the Anscombe's quartet.   Download sample
